subject: fix: re-render Overview tab on tab switch to prevent stale data
body:
When switching between tabs, the Overview tab's Executive Summary was not
being re-rendered, which could cause stale data to display if filters or
the compare period were changed while viewing another tab.

- Add renderSummary() call when switching to Overview tab
- Update extraction counts (now 763 commits across 4 repos)

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GTJnfM2q8ybazZtZ1Y54fg
title: re-render Overview tab on tab switch to prevent stale data
